Interface Scanner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScannerImpl

    public interface Scanner
    Defines the scanner interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScannerContext getContext()
      Return an instance of the scanner context.
      Scope resolveScope(String name)
      Resolve the scope identified by the given fully qualified name.
      <I,D extends com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.store.api.model.Descriptor>
      D      		 scan(I item, String path, Scope scope)
      Scan the given item, e.g. a file, inputstream, directory, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        <I,D extends com.buschmais.jqassistant.core.store.api.model.Descriptor> D scan(I item,
                                                                               String path,
                                                                               Scope scope)
        Scan the given item, e.g. a file, inputstream, directory, etc.
        Type Parameters:
        I - The item type.
        D - The corresponding descriptor type.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.
        path - The path to be passed to the plugins.
        scope - The scope to passed to the plugins.
        Returns:
        The Descriptor as returned by the plugins.
        Throws:
        IOException - If scanning fails.

      • getContext

        ScannerContext getContext()
        Return an instance of the scanner context.
        Returns:
        The scanner context.

      • resolveScope

        Scope resolveScope(String name)
        Resolve the scope identified by the given fully qualified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The fully qualified name.
        Returns:
        The scope.
